column2: "Enuanom
column3: m'akoma mu apɛdze pa ara na mo nkotoserɛ a meserɛ Nyankopɔn ma hɔn nye dɛ

column2: "Na midzi hɔn dase dɛ wɔwɔ Nyankopɔn ho mbɔdzembɔ
column3: na mbom wonnyi ho nyimdzee."

column2: "Na ɔnam dɛ wonnyim Nyankopɔn ne tsenenee
column3: na wɔhwehwɛ dɛ wɔdze hɔnankasa hɔndze si hɔ ntsi
column4: wɔammbrɛ hɔnho adze annhyɛ Nyankopɔn tsenenee no ase."

column2: "Na Kraest nye mbra no n'ewiei a ɔdze obiara a ɔgye dzi kɔ tsenenee mu."
"Na Moses kyerɛw dɛ nyimpa a ɔyɛ tsenenee a ofi mbra no mu no na obenya mu nkwa."
"Na mbrɛ tsenenee a ofi gyedzi mu no ka nye yi
column3: Mma nnse wɔ w'akoma mu dɛ
column4: Woana bɔfow akɔ sor? (Ɔno nye dɛ

column2: "anaadɛ
column3: Woana besian akɔ bun no mu? (Ɔno nye dɛ
column4: ɔrekɛfa Kraest efi ewufo mu aba)."

column2: "Na ɔka dɛn? Asɛm no abɛn wo
column3: ɔwɔ w'anomu
column4: ɔwɔ w'akoma mu: (Ɔno nye gyedzi asɛm a yɛbɔ no dawur no

column2: "dɛ
column3: Sɛ edze w'ano paa mu ka dɛ Jesus nye Ewuradze
column4: na egye dzi wɔ w'akoma mu dɛ Nyankopɔn nyaan no fii ewufo mu a

column2: "na akoma na wɔdze gye dzi kɔ tsenenee mu
column3: na ano na wɔdze paa mu ka kɔ nkwagye mu."

column2: "Na kyerɛw no ka dɛ obiara a ɔbɛgye no edzi no n'enyim runngu ase."
"Na soronko biara nnyi Jewnyi nye Griiknyi ntamu: na Ewuradze kor no ara na odzi hɔn nyina do
column3: na ɔyɛ ɔhonyanyi ma hɔn a wɔfrɛ no nyina:"

column2: "na
column3: Obiara a ɔbɔbɔ Ewuradze dzin no obenya nkwa."

column2: "Na wɔbɛyɛ dɛn afrɛ nyia wɔnngyee no nndzii? Na wɔbɛyɛ dɛn agye nyia wɔnntsee no ho asɛm edzi? Na sɛ ɔsɛnkafo nnyi hɔ a
column3: wɔbɛyɛ dɛn atse?"

column2: "Na sɛ wɔnnsomaa hɔn a
column3: wɔbɛyɛ dɛn abɔ asɛm no dawur? Dɛ mbrɛ wɔakyerɛw no dɛ
column4: Hɔn a wɔdze ndzepa ho asɛmpa ba no
column5: mbrɛ hɔn anan dua yɛ fɛw a!"

column2: "Na hɔn nyinara enntsie asɛmpa no. Na Isaia se dɛ
column3: Ewuradze
column4: woana na ɔagye hɛn amandzɛɛ edzi?"

column2: "Nna gyedzi no fi otsie mu
column3: na otsie nam Kraest asɛm do na ɔba."

column2: "Na mese
column3: Ana wɔanntse koraa? Nyew
column5: Hɔn ndze epuei akɔ asaase nyina do
column6: Na hɔn asɛm edu wiadze ano noho."

column2: "Mibisa bio dɛ
column3: Ana Israel anntse ase? Moses dzi kan ka dɛ
column4: Medze hɔn a wɔnnyɛ ɔman beyi hom nyinkun
column5: Ɔman a wonnyi ntseasee na medze beyi hom ebufuw."

column2: "Isaia so dze ndamyɛ papa ka dɛ
column3: Hɔn a wɔannhwehwɛ me
column4: ehu me; Meyi moho akyerɛ hɔn a woemmbisa m'ekyir kwan."

column2: "Na Israel dze
column3: ɔka kyerɛ hɔn dɛ
column4: Adzekyee tsentsen nyina metserɛɛw me nsamu maa ɔman asokyewfo nye nyiyianofo."
